/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the tranquility of the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. Buildings rise in the background, their windows reflecting the beautiful day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the scene.
